item.title: After my father died, my stepsister transferred assets into her name. Do I have any legal recourse?
item.description: “Since my dad died, I’ve been able to get just one box of personal mementos and some family possessions.”

item.title: Figma’s revenue jumps 41%, but that’s not enough to lift the stock
item.description: Figma’s stock dropped more than 12% after hours after the company merely met Wall Street’s expectations for second-quarter revenue.
